{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=MBR1210 |revision=H2 |fcc_date=07/21/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router, 3G mobile router |fcc_id=PY311200165, N7NMC8705, |ic_id=4054A-11200165 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4717A1;BCM4717A1KFBG; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6445E |ram1=64 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163QI-HCE6 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (USB) |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4717A1;BCM4717A1KFBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC8705 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (USB) |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=3G |wi2_ant_conn=RP-TNC |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G modem |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Mobile HSPA+ Broadband 11n Wireless Router}} :OEM: Manuf. by [[Foxconn]]
*CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4717A1KFBG WiSoC (2T2R 802.11bgn 2.4GHz). *Uses a [[Sierra Wireless]] AirPrime MC8705 Card (FCC ID: N7NMC8705). :There is an external RP-TNC connector for the 3G modem. :The Mini PCIe slot is probably USB only.
